Key Match Events: Anrich Nortje took 4 wickets for 7 runs, helping South Africa win by 6 wickets with 22 balls remaining.
Post-Match Reflections: Anrich Nortje was named Player of the Match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Nassau County International Cricket Stadium in New York.
Others: The match was the 4th in Group D of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024.
